name: Ocean Cleanup
description:
In these prototypes, you need to protect the fish from the damaging effects of waste pollution!

There are three game prototypes, each of them challenge you to save the environment!

General Controls

  • [R] Restart level.
  • [Esc] Quit to main menu.

Game Controls

Turbine

  • [A] Pull with turbine.
  • [D] Push with turbine.
  • [Left Mouse] Change direction of turbine.

Cat Turbine

  • [Left Mouse] Move cat turbine.
  • [Shift] Boost.

Trash Smasher

  • [Left Mouse (hold)] Smash trash.

Developer Notes

I wanted to create a casual game which drove the player to clean up the environment and learn some lessons along the way.

The first of these three prototypes is Cat Turbine. This was created based on a character from an old project my wife worked on; an illustrative comic based in a world where robots try to clean up the planet for us.

The second and third prototypes are variations of the same game, with an aim of creating more challenging gameplay.
